answers.answer: Hi,Thanks for writing in.There is a possibility of nerve compression in the neck and lower back. Other possibility could be peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes and B12 deficiency.I would suggest you to make sure you keep a good posture while sitting, standing and lying down. OTC B complex will also help.Good luck!

question: when i lay down my right lower leg goes a little numb and tingles a lot and today it traveled up my right arm
title: lower right leg numbness and tingling
